**Example 1: 请求示例**



Input: 

```
tccli redis UpgradeVersionToMultiAvailabilityZones --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId crs-5qlrlhux \
    --UpgradeProxyAndRedisServer true
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "FlowId": "140171780",
        "RequestId": "4daddc97-0005-45d8-b5b8-38514ec1e97c"
    }
}
```
